casebody.data:
BURDICK
v.
BURDICK. No. 556P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Lloyd C. Smith, Jr., Windsor, for Mary Kate Burdick.

*437The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of February 2008 by Plaintiff to Reconsider Request for Writ of Certiorari and Grant Long Denied Parental Justice:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
